resources.string: Naturally, focuses on 2 people who really should not be together in traffic or somehow on boats. You\'ve seen this before, but not with these two actors!

The villain has left the hero for dead, or killed the hero’s brother, sister, parents, wife or family pets. Filled with righteous fury, the hero tools up and embarks on a bloody rampage.
If the movie does well, we will do it again in the sequel!
Maybe the villain tries to get revenge on the hero for getting revenge on the villain in this movie…

In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon\'s egg –– a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he\'s the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.
Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
The Lion King II: Simba\'s Pride
Simba\'s daughter is the key to a resolution of a bitter feud between Simba\'s pride and the outcast pride led by the mate of Scar.
Timon the meerkat and Pumbaa the warthog retell the story of The Lion King (1994) from their own perspective.
The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.
